question: âœ¨What is MyRoomDesigner.ai?
answer: MyRoomDesigner.ai is an online tool that allows you to upload a photo of your room and apply different design styles and themes to it.

question: ğŸª„How does it work?
answer: Simply take a photo of your room and upload it to MyRoomDesigner.ai. Then, choose a type of room and select from different popular interior design themes to apply to your room.

question: ğŸ¤© Is MyRoomDesigner.ai free to use?
answer: Yes, you can sign up for free and get 10 renders and access to all features in the app. If you need more renders, you can purchase them at an affordable price.

question: ğŸ”’ Is my personal information secure?
answer: Yes, we take your privacy seriously and your uploaded photos are not shared online. You can select to store your photos in the cloud, but your photos are never shared with a third party. We do not collect any personal information upon registration.

question: ğŸ§¨ Can I delete my photos and renders?
answer: Yes, you can delete your photos and renders from within the app at any time.

question: ğŸï¸ What design styles are available?
